attributes.action: Increase the earnings limit for single persons Working Tax Credit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following this year's Budget, many single people earning a low wage, but not qualifying for Working Tax Credit, find themselves worse off.  These people are less draining on the resources of the country, but lose out again.  Please look at a considerable increase in the upper earnings limit, currently £11500.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
